answers.answer: I only felt movements when I was 19 weeks, but my doctor said anywhere from 18-24 weeks is normal. So don't stress too much yet. Baby could be sitting further towards your back and everyone's bodies respond differently to each pregnancy. You should be having your organ (20 week) scan soon so that will tell you if there are any issues but  sure bubz isfine and just hiding

Im 20 weeks and still haven't felt flutters or movements. Doctor said all is fine :)

question: Hi all. I'm a mum of a 7yr old and currently 18wks with number two. I still have not felt any movements and am not getting overly large. I was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes 6yrs ago and also have bipolar and anxiety. I'm so worried that something is wrong as thought I should be feeling baby by now. Thanks x
title: scared xxx
